categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: JK-027, nicknamed Kay, was a human male Imperial stormtrooper who served in JN-093's squad. They were deployed during the occupation of the Jedha moon. In 0 BBY, the squad failed to make it back to the extraction point before the Destruction of Jedha City, and were wiped out in the fallout.
JK-027 appears in the novelization of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, written by Alexander Freed.
